author: AnnikaStein
body:
Files for two architectures (DeepJet model update for Run 3, ParTAK4 newly introduced) added, used in PRs for cmssw, allowing testing new models for inclusion in 131X (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41275) and backport to 130X (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41434).

As discussed in [XPOG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1263008/#10-ak4-jets-tagging-algorithms), this has been kept open until we could add a fully converged robust model for ParTAK4, which has now been done. In case we want to evaluate the nominal model instead, this is included as a fallback option, not to be used for official productions. This is why in total, three files are added.

All models included here have been trained on 122X samples with PUPPI jets, prepared via DeepNTuples -> DeepJetCore -> PyTorch -> ONNX.
title: Add 122X trainings of DeepJet and ParTAK4
